5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

medium-background-setter

Generic function

Summary

Sets the background for the specified medium.

Signature

medium-background-setter background medium => background

Arguments

background
An instance of type <ink>.

medium
An instance of type <medium>.

Values

background
An instance of type <ink>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Sets the background for medium.

See also

medium-background, page 298

medium-foreground-setter, page 304

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
